description.p: Returns the Base raised to the power of Exponent.

prototypes.prototype: Power as N(Base as N, Exponent as N)

description.p: Returns the *[sql:Base]* raised to the power of *[sql:Exponent]*.

discussion.p: The Power function the *[sql:Base]* raised to the power of *[sql:Exponent]*. See also [Square].

example.caption: Power() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Power(2,4) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 16
